channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The AI portion of Trump’s megabill is drawing flak from both Republicans and Democrats. Here’s why they’re worried.
item.description: As President Donald Trump struggles to unite Republican lawmakers around his megabill, a range of provisions continues to divide the GOP — including o...

item.title: OpenAI’s API lead explains how enterprises are already succeeding with its Agents SDK and Responses API
item.description: OpenAI now includes tracing and eval tools with the API stack to help teams define what success looks like and track how agents perform

item.title: The Download: how to clean up AI data centers, and weight-loss drugs’ side effects

item.title: I’ve been a stay-at-home mom for 10 years. Do I take a part-time job to spend more time with my kids or get a job for six figures?
item.description: “So much of my head has been filled with thoughts of needing to be the best, the brightest, the wealthiest.”

item.title: The hidden scaling cliff that’s about to break your agent rollouts
item.description: Enterprise teams hit a scaling wall when managing AI agents across departments. Writer's May Habib explains why traditional software development fails...

item.title: RISE Robotics raises funding for award-winning Beltdraulic actuators
item.description: RISE Robotics has continued to raise funding for its Beltdraulic actuation system, which it said offers advantages over hydraulics. The post RISE Robo...

item.title: My friend asked me to chip in $1,600 for her son’s prom-night limo. Has the world gone mad?
item.description: “He is handsome and popular and has maintained good grades. My friend wanted to do something special.”

item.title: This battery recycling company is now cleaning up AI data centers
item.description: In a sandy industrial lot outside Reno, Nevada, rows of battery packs that once propelled electric vehicles are now powering a small AI data center. R...

item.title: Most American weddings are a lot more extravagant than the nuptials of Amazon’s Jeff Bezos
item.description: Americans spend an average of $33,000 on their big day, which amounts to between 25% and 50% of their annual household income.

item.title: How Highmark Health and Google Cloud are using Gen AI to streamline medical claims and improve care: 6 key lessons
item.description: Success in generative AI isn’t reserved for those with the biggest budgets, but for those with clear plans, flexible platforms, and patience.

item.title: ‘He doesn’t seem to care’: My secretive father, 81, added my name to a bank account. What about my mom?
item.description: “Neither my mom nor I know anything about their finances.”

item.title: We’re learning more about what weight-loss drugs do to the body

item.title: Google DeepMind introduces on-device Gemini AI model for robots
item.description: In addition to Gemini Robotics On-Device, DeepMind introduced an SDK to help developers evaluate the system for their tasks. The post Google DeepMind ...

item.title: Walmart cracks enterprise AI at scale: Thousands of use cases, one framework
item.description: Walmart VP Desirée Gosby reveals how the retailer scales AI across 255M customers. Enterprise blueprint from Transform 2025 on trust-first deployment.

item.title: What enterprise leaders can learn from LinkedIn’s success with AI agents
item.description: LinkedIn scientists share how they have found success with their LinkedIn hiring assistant, an AI agent that sources and recruits workers.

item.title: Digital Teammate from Badger Technologies uses multipurpose robots
item.description: The Digital Teammate can work alongside store associates to improve inventory management, food safety, and hazard mitigation, says Badger. The post Di...
